title: Council Directive 97/40/EC of 25 June 1997 amending Directive 93/113/EC concerning the use and marketing of enzymes, micro-organisms and their preparations in animal nutrition
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 97/40/EC of 25 June 1997 amending Directive 93/113/EC concerning the use and marketing of enzymes, micro-organisms and their preparations in animal nutrition
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The date of 1 January 1997 in Article 5 of Directive 93/113/EC shall be replaced by 1 July 1998.
This Directive shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 25 June 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. VAN AARTSEN
